title: So Akali looks like she's losing her obscurity on her shroud. Why is no one talking about this?

embed.description: Twilight Shroud (W) Cooldown changed from 25/22/19/16/13 to 25 [New ] Cooldown starts on cast rather than after Shroud expiration Energy restore changed from 40/50/60/70/80 to 80 [Removed ] duration extension Stealth type changed from obscurity to invisibility Shuriken Flip (E) missile damage changed from [70/105/140/175/210 (+70% bAD)] to [40/70/100/130/160

body:
Full Changes to W:
Cooldown changed from 25/22/19/16/13 to 25
[New] Cooldown starts on cast rather than after Shroud expiration
Energy restore changed from 40/50/60/70/80 to 80
[Removed] duration extension
**Stealth type changed from obscurity to invisibility**

Are people really not noticing probably one of the bigger changes to Akali right now? I mean, this was suppose to be the very unique thing about her shroud as opposed to the other two stealth options in the game and Riot was putting a lot of emphasis on it. 

But let me be also clear: I'M NOT UPSET THAT IT'S GOING! If anything, it was the most annoying thing about. Having her tower dive you while your tower just stood there and did nothing as she melded back into her safety cloud blanket (when it was still a thing) was DUMB! Having her not be revealed in anyway through this shroud is DUMB! It's just what makes her frustrating to play against.

And this now has to make me raise the question: is the Akali rework now just a complete flop? I mean, Akali has been nerfed how many times since the rework? They're now streamlining her W to make it more fair to play against with True Sight, but even if it's now less annoying (again not saying I'm upset with this change), doesn't that defeat the whole purpose of the reworks intent?
